thread.title: Cloud 3C is Proud to Announce the Release of WiFiView3C Connect!
thread.title_full: Cloud 3C is Proud to Announce the Release of WiFiView3C Connect! - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Cloud 3C is Proud to Announce the Release of WiFiView3C Connect!
text:
Cloud 3C is Proud to Announce the Release of WiFiView3C Connect!
Orlando, FL, September 10, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Cloud 3C, the Orlando-based provider of communication and technology solutions for organizations and government agencies, is pleased to reveal their newest product offering- WiFiView3C Connect!™ Powered by Adtran and Samsung.
With many wireless access points and cameras to choose from, Cloud 3C recognizes Adtran and Samsung as continually being ‘best in breed’ as leaders in this venue. What WiFiView3C Connect!™ offers is an innovative solution aimed to improve secure Wi-Fi and visual camera security with a Managed Service deliverable.
Chris Caffera, VP Business Development & Strategy, was noted stating “WiFiView3C Connect! ™ meets the needs of clients looking for sophisticated wireless access and state of the art imaging that this solution provides.” Additionally, he added, “with many programs available, this managed service gives clients the opportunity to fully invest on-time or as-a-service for as little as $95 per month with minimal to no capital investment.” Further stating, “As an internet (IP) capable solution, one can see what is happening from his/her office, car, home, boat, train or plane on any device.”
Adtran’s family of high-performance Wireless Access Points (AP’s) are the perfect fit for small, large and multi-site enterprises looking to deploy secure wireless networks. Whether an organization is wanting to add wireless to their office or light-up an entire campus, Adtran’s APs are designed to meet most needs.
Samsung Video Camera Technology is used to monitor activities at any organization. Whether reviewing incidents, preventing future occurrences, searching for children separated from their parents, or providing visual deterrents to crime- the Samsung WiseNet® Lite family of products will do just that. In addition, these cameras enable visual inspection of exterior doors, interior spaces, poorly lit and dark areas. With rich features such as remote access to video, digital zoom for forensic review, license plate identification for parking lots, an organization has the ability to incorporate intelligent video analytics and reduce insurance premiums.
For More Information Contact
Chris Caffera, Vice President Business Development & Strategy, Cloud 3C, 407-732-5710, Chris@cloud3c.com to learn more about WiFiView3C Connect! ™ and on how to future-proof, disaster-proof, and mobilize your business today! 855.9Cloud3C; www.cloud3c.com.
About Adtran & Bluesocket
Adtran is an award winning carrier class provider of network appliances software and solutions with a solid track record- Rated #1 in Carrier Class Reliability. With vast knowledge of Router, Switch, IP Gateways, Wireless and VoIP, Adtran stands at the top of the list in network manufacturers in the USA. For more information, please visit www.adtran.com.
About Samsung Cameras
Samsung Electronics is a global market leader in high-tech electronics manufacturing and digital media. In conjunction with Samsung, Cloud 3C is proud to provide Samsung security systems in addition to their many other services and products. Multitasking made easy, with multi-camera, multi-channel high resolution analog Samsung DVR security systems. Promising to deliver, “through innovative, reliable products and services; talented people; a responsible approach to business and global citizenship; and collaboration with [their] partners and customers, Samsung is taking the world in imaginative new directions.” For more information, please visit www.samsung.com.
About Cloud 3C
Cloud 3C is an expert in business communication systems that use the Internet as a convenient, reliable channel for phone, data and technology services. Our consultative approach alleviates technology investment anxiety and ensures that your future-proof communication system improves efficiency, reduces costs and grows with your company. Highly certified and experienced technicians deliver a range of solutions from installing network infrastructure and IP phones on site to providing hassle-free hosted and managed services for VoIP calling, Wi-Fi business software, security services, email and more. For more information, please visit www.cloud3c.com or contact us at info@cloud3c.com.
